glosses: a village in Espiye district, Giresun Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Kabadüz district, Ordu Province, Turkey
a village in Kemalpaşa district, Artvin Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Kızıltepe district, Mardin Province, Turkey
a village in Pazaryeri district, Bilecik Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Sarıyer district, Istanbul, Turkey
a village in Sivas district, Sivas Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Tavas district, Denizli Province, Turkey
synonym of Edremit (“a district in Van Province”)

etymology: By surface analysis, gümüş (“silver”) + dere (“valley; ravine, gorge”).
